aggressive.title: Agressive Mode:
aggressive.description: This mode usually finds the only correct option, but may not find some of your clothes. If not, use chill mode.

chill.title: Chill Mode:
chill.description: This mod it will find the correct option but it may produce more than one result, switch to aggressive mode if there are too many options

feedback: Give us feedback and contribute to the um-soup project
